metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10026 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
ikiwiki 3.20161219 does not properly check if a revision changes the accesspermissions for a page on sites with the git and recentchanges plugins andthe CGI interface enabled, which allows remote attackers to revert certainchanges by leveraging permissions to change the page before the revisionwas made.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20161219
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20161219').
